input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Acrimet Wall-mounted Modular File Holder (2 - Pack) (Smoke Color)

Item keywords:
Modern Modular Design Easy to expand to fit your needs
Modern, strong and sturdy construction
Includes Wall Hangers
Makes Organizing Easy
Set with 2
input_text.Response A: Expand your storage space with the Acrimet Wall-mounted Modular File Holder!  This modern, sturdy organizer is designed to hold letter sized folders and documents, and can easily be expanded to suit your storage needs.  The modular design allows you to add additional holders as needed, and the smoke color finish complements any modern decor.  Includes wall hangers for easy installation.  Set of 2.
input_text.Response B: A modern modular design, this 2-pack of wall-mounted file holders can be used to organize your workspace or home office. With a sturdy construction and easy-to-expand design, you can easily fit your needs. The smoke color gives the set a modern look that will complement any decor. This wall-mounted file holder is the perfect solution for anyone looking to organize their workspace or home office. Its modern design, strong and sturdy construction, and easy-to-expand features make it a must-have for anyone looking to stay organized.
